42.eng-name: Model Behavior of the Prophet (Kitab Al-Sunnah)

hadiths.text: ‘Arfajah told that he heard the Messenger of Allah (May peace be upon him) as saying :various corruptions will arise in my community, so strike with sword the one who tries to cause separation in the matter of Muslims when they are united, whoever he be

chapter.eng-name: On The Killing Of The Khawarij
